 
{{Client function}}
This function is used to change the volume level of the specified [[/sound.md|sound]] [[/element.md|element]].
Use a player element to control a players voice with this function.

==Syntax== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">bool setSoundVolume ( element theSound, float volume )</syntaxhighlight> 
{{OOP||[[/sound.md|sound]]:setVolume|volume|getSoundVolume}}
===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theSound:''' The [[/sound.md|sound]] [[/element.md|element]] which volume you want to modify.
*'''volume:''' A [[/float.md|float]]ing point number representing the desired volume level. Range is from '''0.0''' to '''1.0'''

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the [[/sound.md|sound]] [[/element.md|element]] volume was successfully changed, ''false'' otherwise.

==Example== 
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
function wasted (killer, weapon, bodypart)
        local sound = playSound("sounds/wasted.mp3") --Play wasted.mp3 from the sounds folder
        setSoundVolume(sound, 0.5) -- set the sound volume to 50%
end

addEventHandler("onClientPlayerWasted", localPlayer, wasted) --add the event handler 
</syntaxhighlight>
